name: PixelGrow
description:
Pixelgrow brought together a very wide variety of professionals: designers, developers, illustrators, and animators, who are entrepreneurs at heart. This convergence creates a great blend of different talents and skills, which in turn creates a great product.
 
Engineering. Our team of professionals engineer world-class websites, web applications, native and hybrid mobile apps for iOS and Android. Thanks to our product expertise we are able to develop products that include only necessary features and follow latest industry trends.
 
Design. We dedicate ourselves to produce a seamless and effective user experience for mobile and web. Fully interactive wireframes help you experience the product before it is engineered, and beautiful interface design makes sure your product engages end users and reaches your business goals.
 
Animation. We create exceptional animations for explainer videos, games, mobile and web user interfaces. This helps explain complex stories in a simple way, highlight the most important content on the page and make user interface intuitive and easy to use.
